name: Microverse (KsanaDock)
description: [项目级] A god-simulation sandbox game built on Godot 4 as a multi-agent AI social simulation system. In this virtual world, AI characters possess independent thinking and memory, capable of autonomous social interactions, task completion, and developing complex social relationships through continuous communication.。来源: https://github.com/KsanaDock/Microverse

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A god-simulation sandbox game built on Godot 4 as a multi-agent AI social simulation system. In this virtual world, AI characters possess independent thinking and memory, capable of autonomous social interactions, task completion, and developing complex social relationships through continuous communication.

来源: https://github.com/KsanaDock/Microverse
语言: GDScript
Stars: 2117
